properties.publicRemarks:
Unique Opportunity... This Lovely Californian Model is Highly Sought after... You'll Love the Premium East facing... Golf View off the 14th Tee on the Par 3 Executive Course! Beautiful  Chocolate Mountains and Sonoran Golf View! A lovely Courtyard entry greets your guests. This ''Stunning'' Californian home features 2656 Sq Ft of Open and Inviting Space for Daily Living, & Relaxation!  Conveniently located Atrium is great for extending your Gatherings & Ease in Entertaining! Enjoy 3 Bedrooms, 3 Baths, Spacious Great Room with a Fireplace! Custom Crown Moulding & Upgraded Baseboards, Neutral Tile through-out (Plush Carpet in Bedrooms). Gourmet Kitchen with Granite Counter Tops, plenty of Cabinets for Storage! Walk in Pantry! Roll Out Shelving!  Formal Dining, plus a Large Breakfast Nook & Kitchen Island!  Stainless Steel Appliances, Fridge Included! Butlers side pantry w/built in wine/beverage fridge! Primary Suite is King Sized, Beautiful primary Bath with Separate Tub & Shower, Dual Sink Vanity. Large Walk in Closet! Secondary Primary Bedroom is Queen Sized with Private Bath and Walk in Closet! 3rd Bedroom with walk in closet, Bath Adjacent. Patio with Covered Patio, Pavers, & Fire Pit... Enjoy the everchanging ''Chocolate Mountain'' views! 
Large 8712 sq ft lot, there is room to build a Lap Pool/Spa- However there are 2 Clubhouses with Pools, Spas & an Indoor Pool/spa! 3 Car Tandem Garage is oversized, plenty of room for storage, cars & a Golf Cart! Garage Epoxy Flooring! Tankless Water Heater.  Don't delay, this home is priced to Sell, Motivated Seller! Sun City Shadow Hills offers the Best in Retirement Living, Over 60 clubs, Social Events... Concerts, Performing Arts, Excursions & So Much More! Banquet Room w/Catering Kitchen, Billiard Room, Craft/Music room(s), Library, 2 Fitness Centers, Bistros, Restaurant, 2 Golf Courses, Putting Greens, Driving Range, Tennis, Pickle Ball, Boccie/Shuffleboard, Doggie Parks, Walking trail w/pond views! Nearby Shopping, Dining, Entertainment, Acrissure Arena, and low HOA dues... make this Community an Ideal Choice!

properties.publicRemarks:
Don't miss this opportunity these lots rarely hit the market. 10 acres zoned for multiple usage. R-D, DE-1, DET-3, SN-4, SN-8 and MH
this property allows for 3 homes per acre, up to 10 mobile homes per acre. Also zoned for community gardens, crop production, greenhouses, cannabis cultivation, ADU, telecommunication facility and renewable energy systems! 
Even commercial zoning with the proper applications. 

 

The list goes on! Endless Opportunities!
